channel.title: YangYang - Homepage Updates
channel.description: Updates from YangYang's homepage, including new publications and talks.

item.title: New Publication: An Improved YOLOv8-Based Rice Pest and Disease Detection Method
item.description:
Authors: Yang Yang, Jianlin Zhu, Bo Yang, Xiao Zhang, Jin Huang

Conference: Computer Graphics International Conference 2024 (CGI 2024)

Abstract: This paper presents an enhanced YOLOv8 model for detecting rice pests and diseases, contributing to precision agriculture through advanced computer vision techniques.

PDF | Code | Dataset | Cite

item.title: New Talk: An Improved YOLOv8-Based Rice Pest and Disease Detection Method (CGI 2024)
item.description:
Event: Computer Graphics International Conference 2024 (Online)

Description: This talk presents an improved YOLOv8-based rice pest and disease detection method.

Slides | Video
